original: intros u l. split. - intros Hlim eps Heps. specialize (Hlim (Rabs l - eps)). destruct Hlim as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. apply R_dist_tri in HN. unfold_ball. eapply Rle_lt_trans; [|apply HN]. unfold R_dist in *. ring_simplify. auto. - intros Hcv eps Heps. destruct (Hcv eps Heps) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. eapply Rlt_le_trans;[apply HN|]. apply Rnot_lt_le. intros Habs. apply R_dist_tri in Habs. ring_simplify in Habs.
